member.name: M:UnityEngine.Animation.CrossFadeQueued
member.exception: After the animation has finished playing it will automatically clean itself up. Using the duplicated animation state after it has finished will result in an exception.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Animation.PlayQueued
member.exception: After the animation has finished playing it will automatically clean itself up. Using the duplicated animation state after it has finished will result in an exception.
